title: Illinois governor calls lack of national stay-at-home order a "profound failure"
description: Some state and local officials across the U.S. are asking President Trump to impose a national stay-at-home order. Illinois Governor J. B. Pritzker said his state has "exhausted every avenue available" and labeled the lack of a national order as a "profound f…
